synopsis.text: The monotonous life of Yukio 'Koyuki' Tanaka, a 14-year-old boy, takes a dramatic turn when he rescues an unusual dog, Beck, from a group of bullies. Beck's owner, Ryuusuke 'Ray' Minami, a 16-year-old prodigy guitarist and ex-member of a popular rock band, introduces Koyuki to the captivating world of western rock music. Inspired by Ray's incredible guitar skills, Koyuki decides to learn the instrument and help Ray build the ultimate rock band. Together with Ray's younger sister Maho and other members, they form the band BECK, embarking on a journey filled with challenges and triumphs as they strive to make their mark in Japan's rock music scene. This anime follows BECK's rise to fame, showcasing the transformative power of music and the unwavering dedication required to achieve one's dreams.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
